text: Because my parents, growing up, they worked hard. Everyone in my family woke up early in the morning. I used to see my mother and my father go off to work, and come back and, no matter what, they had time for the kids.
author: Herschel Walker

text: In the morning, I reach for the sports page.
author: Lisa Guerrero

text: On my morning run, I listen to sports talk radio.
author: Lisa Guerrero

text: I can't record in the morning because I sound like Barry White.
author: Toni Braxton

text: Bagel in the morning is the ultimate breakfast for me they're just good.
author: Lee DeWyze
